_addLiquidity(StrategyWmaticUsdc,uint256.notice: ActionType: ADD_LIQUIDITY Add liquidity to mesh pool: [wmatic, usdc] -> mesh lpToken

_removeLiquidity(StrategyWmaticUsdc,uint.notice: ActionType: REMOVE_LIQUIDITY Remove liquidity from mesh pool: mesh lpToken -> [wmatic, usdc]

_swapUsdPlusToUsdc(StrategyWmaticUsdc,ui.notice: ActionType: SWAP_USDPLUS_TO_ASSET Swap on exchange usdPlus -> usdc

_swapUsdcToUsdPlus(StrategyWmaticUsdc,ui.notice: ActionType: SWAP_ASSET_TO_USDPLUS Swap on exchange usdc -> usdPlus

_swapUsdcToWmatic(StrategyWmaticUsdc,uin.notice: ActionType: SWAP_ASSET_TO_TOKEN Swap on UniswapV3 usdc -> wmatic

_swapWmaticToUsdc(StrategyWmaticUsdc,uin.notice: ActionType: SWAP_TOKEN_TO_ASSET Swap on UniswapV3 wmatic -> usdc
